features: 🌐 REST Client with method, headers, body
loggedInText: RBrains REST Client — a smart, lightweight, and modern API testing tool, built by the RBrains team as part of an educational project.
In the main menu, you’ll find the following sections:
🌐 REST Client – create and send HTTP requests, set headers, customize body content, and view detailed responses.
📂 History – keep track of previously made requests and easily re-run or inspect them.
🧩 Variables – manage reusable variables for dynamic request configuration.
These tools are designed to help you test and work with RESTful APIs more efficiently — all in one place.
